item.description:
The difference between healthy people vs. unhealthy people is education and information.  The difference between financially healthy and unhealthy people is education and information.

Come to this meetup to learn how you can be a financially and physically healthier and a stronger you by:

  • Learning about multiple streams of income
  • Learning about finances
  • Preventing Disease
  • Managing and/or eradicating existing diseases
  • Giving you more energy

 

Our mission is to educate people about health, wellness, finances, multiple streams of income and weathering the current economic storm that we are currently facing with educational and opportunity seminars.

Topics of discussion include, but are not limited to:

a. Plant Derived & Essential Minerals

b. The importance of good solid nutrition

b.  Setting yourself up for financial success

i. Budgeting

ii. Plug the holes in your financial boat

iii. Increase your cash flow

b. Tax strategies and benefits to reduce your tax liability

c. Increasing your monthly cash flow

d. Maximizing your credit score

e. Learning to live a debt free lifestyle

f. Creating multiple streams of income

g. Intro to real estate investing

h. Home based businesses

 

Featured speakers will include local nutrition experts, successful business professionals, top money earners in home based business, top rated CPA’s, real estate professionals and more.

topics_item.name: Creating Multiple Streams of Business Income

item.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth
